Macros
HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_LOG2
HWA Driver External Data Structures » HWA_MACROS

Macros that define values for enabling/disabling the magniude and log2 computation in FFT block. More...

Macros

#define HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_LOG2_DISABLED   ((uint8_t)0U)
 
#define HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_ONLY_ENABLED   ((uint8_t)2U)
 
#define HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_LOG2_ENABLED   ((uint8_t)3U)
 

Detailed Description

Macros that define values for enabling/disabling the magniude and log2 computation in FFT block.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_LOG2_DISABLED   ((uint8_t)0U)

magnitude disabled and log2 disabled

#define HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_LOG2_ENABLED   ((uint8_t)3U)

magnitude and log2 enabled

#define HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_ONLY_ENABLED   ((uint8_t)2U)

magnitude enabled and log2 disabled
